radar: Hovland tees off at Pebble Beach on Sunday morning (06:00) in one of golf's most scenic tournaments. The AT&T Pro-Am features celebrities alongside pros on California's legendary coastal course.

Norway's relay teams could dominate the second Olympic week ‚Äî the men's biathlon relay (Mon 14:00) looks particularly strong with the Boe brothers leading the charge. Kristoffersen and Braathen get another medal shot in slalom on Tuesday.
